articles.author: James Hyerczyk
articles.title: Gold Prices Forecast: XAU/USD to Face Pressure from Rising Treasury Yields - FX Empire
articles.description: Increasing 10-year Treasury yield and dollar index rise reduce gold’s appeal despite inflation concerns.
articles.content:
Weekly Gold (XAU/USD)
The dollar index rose over the week, and the benchmark 10-year Treasury yield also increased, reducing golds appeal. Reports showed an unexpected rise in U.S. producer prices i… [+1726 chars]
